title: Touchdown!
description: Broncos drive down the field with ease and cap it off with a touchdown from Manning to Demaryius Thomas

title: Touchdown!
description: Touchdown Colts! Luck awkwardly hands the ball off on a counter but the confusion somehow works out as Herron runs in for a six-yard touchdown

title: Touchdown!
description: Touchdown Colts! Dwayne Allen the popular red-zone target catches the three-yard score as the Colts drive all the way down the field and take the lead

title: Field goal
description: Connor Barth makes the 45-yard field goal and the Colts lead has been reduced to just four points

title: Touchdown
description: Touchdown Colts! Luck makes another beautiful throw on the move hitting Hakeem Nicks in the end zone for a 15-yard score

title: Field goal
description: Barth makes the 41-yard field goal making it a one-possession game

title: Field goal
description: Chewing up nearly eight minutes of clock the Colts drive all the way down the field and set up and easy field goal for Vinatieri

title: Full-time
description: Colts win! Despite being heavy underdogs the Colts get a convincing win against the Broncos
